name: Sour Tooth
description:
Heal cavity-ridden teeth and progress as far as you can!

WASD to move and space or mouse click to shoot.

Dentist Mode - Each level gets progressively more difficult. How many smiles can you complete?

Arcade Mode - Your score steadily decreases. Shoot teeth to fill it back up. The longer you last, the higher potential you have to get a high score!
